column1: Does anybody else think Kyle Lowry is overrated and annoying? Like if he played at your local basketball court he would be the guy that everyone gets irritated by, both the people playing for his team and against him. And on a more serious note, is he a Hall-of-Famer?

JJ Redick on why the NBA is investigating tampering: "Some teams cleared cap space to get Kyle and it didnt happen and Lonzo leaving so you have to ask that guy, that guy complaining."
Kyle Kuzma gives me a high five at the OKC thunder game! Such a nice guy!
